entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint-Jérôme
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:20 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain before morning. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
